parameter.name: transactionId
parameter.description: The identifier of the transaction of creating the project time sheet.

parameter.name: timesheetProject
parameter.description: The project name that the time sheet needs to be updated with.

parameter.name: timesheetTask
parameter.description: Taskname that needs to be updated in the timesheet.

parameter.name: timesheetDetail
parameter.description: Detail name that needs to be updated in the timesheet.

parameter.name: startTime
parameter.description: Start time of the timesheet. Input format hh:mm.

parameter.name: endTime
parameter.description: End time of the timesheet. Input format hh:mm.

parameter.name: totalHours
parameter.description: Total number of hours.Should match Start and End time.

parameter.name: notes
parameter.description: Any additional details about the time sheet.
